import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={news:[],result:0};export var homePageSlice=createSlice({name:'homePage',initialState:initialState,reducers:{changeResult:function changeResult(state,action){state.result=action.payload;},// showNews: (state, action: PayloadAction<News>) => {},
setNews:function setNews(state,action){state.news=action.payload.news;}}});var changeResult=homePageSlice.actions.changeResult;export{changeResult};var setNews=homePageSlice.actions.setNews;export{setNews};export var homePageReducer=homePageSlice.reducer;
